Trade war, communist party, Xinjiang concentration, Covid-19, Huaiwei-5G, Tiktok, ..., When was your last time hearing something positive of China? Have you heard about China alleviating hundreds of millions of people out of extreme poverty, showing its incredible  resilience in overcoming the effects of economic crisis, decisive implementation of rural revitalization strategy...? Sometimes thing is not as simple as we think... People definitely need a more objective way, especially abandoning ideology, to understand China, and the people living there. When we look at what is happening in the West, their systems are facing unprecedented challenges. We need to cooperate and embrace diversities of global governance in key issues such as climate change.

Here is a Youtube channel to recommend: [National Committee on U.S.-China Relations](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1E5-wg_F4vFWWsP-CTcP1g)
